subsystems.name: ingestion-pipeline
subsystems.purpose: Ingest raw data from external sources, normalize, store, and report.

subsystems.name: extraction-engine
subsystems.purpose: Extract structured entities from raw data using LLM-backed extractors.

subsystems.name: orchestration
subsystems.purpose: Plan and coordinate multi-stage extraction workflows.

subsystems.name: schema-system
subsystems.purpose: Parse YAML schemas and generate code artifacts (Pydantic, Prisma, TypeScript).

subsystems.name: lens-system
subsystems.purpose: Load, validate, and operate on lens definitions.

subsystems.name: resolution-merging
subsystems.purpose: Resolve duplicates and merge entity records.

subsystems.name: lens-definitions
subsystems.purpose: YAML lens definitions for domain-specific extraction and SEO facets.

subsystems.name: scripts-tooling
subsystems.purpose: Utility scripts and ad-hoc tooling for extraction workflows.
